testcase.name: TC08 registering with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on registration page..........................................passed And user enters ssn number..................................................passed And user enters firstname...................................................passed And user enters lastname....................................................passed And user provides username..................................................passed And user provides email.....................................................passed And user provides firstPassword.............................................passed And user provides secondPassword............................................passed When user clicks on register button.........................................passed Then user verifies the success message as "Registration Saved"..............passed
